About Us Cherish the Lifestyle History Grove Life In the news Boca Grove Cares Discover the pinnacle of luxurious living at Boca Grove. Welcome to Boca Grove, the pinnacle of luxurious living in the heart of Boca Raton. Our exquisite golf and country club community is a serene oasis where residents enjoy a coveted lifestyle unmatched by any other. At Boca Grove, we believe in living life to the fullest. That's why we've created a community that embodies the highest standards of sophistication, exclusivity, and refinement. Our members have access to a wealth of world-class amenities, including an 18-hole championship golf course, state-of-the-art tennis facility, and a stunning clubhouse that sets the standard for luxury. But Boca Grove is more than just a place to live. It's a community of like-minded individuals who share a passion for excellence and a commitment to living life on their own terms. Whether you're mingling with friends at one of our exclusive events, indulging in a gourmet meal at our world-class restaurant, or simply lounging by the pool, you'll find that life at Boca Grove is the ultimate expression of luxury and sophistication. So if you're looking for a place to call home, a place where you can live life to the fullest, look no further than Boca Grove. Our commitment to excellence is unparalleled, and our dedication to our members is unwavering. Join us today and experience the pinnacle of luxurious living in the heart of Boca Raton. With the best location in Boca Raton, Boca Grove is centrally located, directly across from the Glades Road turnpike exit. We are conveniently located near premier shopping and fabulous restaurants, and less than six miles from the beach, Boca Grove boasts more accessibility to beautiful South Florida than any other club in the area. Near Boca Raton Regional Hospital, one of the best in the state, as well as Top-Rated "A" Level schools at all levels, K through 12, public and private. Discover Tradition Own the Lifestyle Prime real estate opportunities in Boca Raton's premier country club. At Boca Grove, you can do more than just enjoy a premier country club lifestyle - you can own it. Boca Grove offers a variety of exquisite homes for sale, in different settings and styles, for a residential living experience like nowhere else. Choose from seven exclusive subdivisions, each a distinct community of its own, with unique features, locations and views. Luxurious residences range from upscale, low-maintenance condominiums and townhomes to zero-lot-line single-family homes and lavish estate homes, all in a secure, gated environment. Boca Grove has the perfect home for you. Everything you've imagined living in a country club community to be is here. Sweeping golf course views. Luxurious homes with fine features and finishes. Picturesque lake views. Unrivaled services and amenities. Isn't it time to get the home you've always dreamed of, in a beautiful country club setting? Or that second home, nestled away from the hustle and bustle of your busy life. Whatever your desire, whatever your style, Boca Grove has the perfect home for you.

Ready to see what's available? Click here for our current listing of homes for sale at Boca Grove.

Explore Membership Our Story... Take a walk through time and learn more about our roots Founded in 1983 by the LaBonte family, Boca Grove is more than a golf and tennis clubâitâs a living reflection of Boca Ratonâs evolution. Members still remember when orange trees lined the fairways, and you could pick fruit during harvest season. âThat orange grove is a big part of our history,â says Jennifer M. Jolly, the clubâs General Manager. âWeâve changed with the times, but we havenât changed who we are.â Enjoy Our Latest Videos on YouTube

The perfect way to experience everything Boca Grove has to offer.

Discover the ultimate in luxury living with membership at Boca Grove, the most exclusive golf and country club in Boca Raton. As a member, you'll enjoy access to top-notch amenities, personalized service, and exclusive events that showcase the finest in culinary and recreational experiences. Previous Next Watch Videos Now Grove Life: The Boca Grove Newsletter Stay in touch with all that's happening at Boca Grove. Grove Life is our official Boca Grove newsletter. Each issue is chock-full of news and information about everything that's happening in our country club community, including social events, golf, tennis and fitness activities, special dining events, photos from past activities, and lots more. Read our latest issues by clicking on any of the covers below. Boca Grove is in the news! Everyone's talking about the Boca Grove lifestyle. Find all the latest news here in our News Room, where Boca Grove shines in the spotlight and shares the boutique lifestyle that our members love. Read our latest press releases and see our latest media coverage here. Media articles, features, and more.

"Boca Grove Cares" is the community involvement initiative at Boca Grove. For us, giving back to the community is all about "Time, Talent and Treasure"! Our community involvement includes multiple events during the year including hosting junior golf tournaments, serving the less fortunate by cooking or baking and walking for good causes.

    Jennifer M. Jolly, General Manager of Boca Grove, is proud to have just received the Jay DiPietro, CCM Most Valuable Member Award for her club efforts during the pandemic.

    Click here to find out more about this news! 07/25/2023: Education Foundation, Red Apple Supplies Education Foundation: Red Apple Supplies Roberto Rodriguez, Making a Difference Boca Grove Good News 03.11.23 A Jolly View "Horseplay" - February 23, 2023 Equine Assisted Therapies

    BREAKING NEWS!

    Jennifer M. Jolly, General Manager of Boca Grove, is proud to have just received the Jay DiPietro, CCM Most Valuable Member Award for her club efforts during the pandemic.

    Since our inception, the Florida Chapter has been recognized by various associations and charities for our leadership, commitment to excellence and philanthropy efforts. Our members are leaders in their communities and clubs.

    The Jay DiPietro Award, previously known as the Most Valuable Member Award is awarded annually to a Chapter member who through their service or by their actions are most deserving of the recognition of their peers. Such services or actions may have come at the Chapter or Regional level, be directly related to FLCMAA programs or activities or to those who provided outstanding service in their club community.

    In addition to the pandemic, we are also:

    • managing a $11.5M renovation project scheduled to open in September;
    • successfully completed the vote to merge our club with our POA; and
    • Jolly is one of only 61 women worldwide to carry the CCM designation

    Jolly has been recognized for her outstanding service to our community including:

    • serving on the Board of the Greater Boca Chamber of Commerce;
    • active member of Rotary International through Boca Ratonâs Sunshine Rotary;
    • active in many local charities including Best Foot Forward, Boys & Girls Club, Equine Assisted Therapy of South Florida, Florence Fuller, George Snow Schloarship Foundation, Nat King Cole Generation Hope, SOS Childrenâs Village and Unicorn Foundation just to name a few!

    Congratulations Jennifer! We are so proud to have you as our leader!

    A Jolly View "Horseplay" - February 23, 2023

Membership Cherish the Lifestyle Experience the ultimate in elegance and exclusivity with a membership at Boca Grove. From exhilarating rounds of golf to luxurious evenings in the Grove Room, members enjoy a lifestyle unmatched by any other country club community in the world. As a mandatory membership community, Boca Grove offers something for everyone, whether you're an avid golfer, tennis player, or simply enjoy the finest in culinary and recreational experiences. Be a part of this rich tradition. Enjoy the luxurious amenities reserved for members. Delight in the lifestyle of this illustrious community. Join the distinguished roster of Boca Grove members. Prime real estate opportunities in Boca Raton's premier country club. At Boca Grove, you can do more than just enjoy a premier country club lifestyle - you can own it. Boca Grove offers a variety of exquisite homes for sale, in different settings and styles, for a residential living experience like nowhere else. Choose from seven exclusive subdivisions, each a distinct community of its own, with unique features, locations and views. Luxurious residences range from upscale, low-maintenance condominiums and townhomes to zero-lot-line single-family homes and lavish estate homes, all in a secure, gated environment. Boca Grove has the perfect home for you. Everything you've imagined living in a country club community to be is here. Sweeping golf course views. Luxurious homes with fine features and finishes. Picturesque lake views. Unrivaled services and amenities. Isn't it time to get the home you've always dreamed of, in a beautiful country club setting? Or that second home, nestled away from the hustle and bustle of your busy life. Whatever your desire, whatever your style, Boca Grove has the perfect home for you. Ready to see what's available? Click here for our current listing of homes for sale at Boca Grove. CONTACT US TODAY Community & Real Estate Seven unique subdivisions offer something for every homebuyer. At Boca Grove, you can choose from a variety of luxurious residences in seven exclusive subdivisions. Each subdivision in a distinct community unto itself, with a unique setting, ambience, and style of homes that truly sets it apart. Whatever your preference, Boca Grove has the perfect home for you. 1. Chateau L uxury condominiums in a sleek, six-story building. Enjoy a full suite of amenities including concierge service and your own private elevator to take you directly to your residence. An intimate collection of 24 condos, each with its own two car garage. 2. Coventry S ingle-family living at its finest. 30 beautiful zero-lot-line homes featuring picturesque golf course views on the first and sixth fairways. 3. Estates S pacious single-family estate homes in an intimate setting. Only 13 homes in all; half of which overlook the fifteenth hole. 4. Gardens in the Grove C harming garden homes offering convenience and luxury. 24 residences located in two buildings, with convenient parking underneath. Residents enjoy a private pool and meeting room. 5. Islands in the Grove A n idyllic community of 56 single-family homes. Residents enjoy private backyards and gorgeous lake views. 6. Los Rayos A mixed community comprised of 24 luxurious townhouses and ten single-family zero-lot-line homes. The best of both worlds. 7. Single Family Homes B oca Groveâs community of single-family homes provides all the ambiance of a traditional old fashioned neighborhood. 250 single family custom homes set among tree lined sidewalks. The prefect setting for neighbors to become friends.

Take a bird's-eye look at Boca Grove Plantation with our property map. See how thoughtfully planned and conveniently set each of our seven distinct subdivisions are within the community, with the clubhouse at the center of it all. Homes are naturally woven throughout the property, among lakes, fairways, and lush landscaping. It's the ideal setting for the perfect country club lifestyle.

THE INFO PROVIDED IS NOT INTENDED TO SUBSTITUTE FOR THE ADVICE OF A LAWYER OR OTHER QUALIFIED PROFESSIONAL. SAFETY & SECURITY The safety of our residents is our top priority. To that end, we employ a dedicated and experienced group of security personnel who ensure that our gated community is secure around the clock. Our streets are patrolled daily and in addition to daytime and nighttime thermal imaging cameras stationed at the perimeter of our property, we also utilize a convenient emergency notification system for critical phone and text communications to our residents. Additional technology we offer includes a gate access mobile app by which residents may conveniently add guests to their entry lists day or night. In addition, a mass notification system called CodeRED is utilized by our community that sends personalized emergency alert messages via call or text to members that register with Boca Grove. Enjoy peace of mind at Boca Grove, whether you will be a full-time resident or will consider us your home away from home! Available Country Club Memberships At Boca Grove, we hold our members to the highest standards of excellence, and all memberships are subject to a thorough background check, as permitted by law. Join our community today and discover why Boca Grove is the premier destination for those who demand the very best in life.

Choose from a range of exclusive membership options tailored to fit your unique lifestyle and preferences, and join the discerning few who demand the very best in life.

Explore our community and contact us today to Take the First Step toward Joining Boca Grove. Equity Membership for Boca Grove Residents Whether putting on the green or serving on clay, Boca Grove is your escape from the everyday. When you live in the country club community of Boca Grove, you're afforded a number of exclusive amenities just for equity members. For the golfer, we offer 18-holes of championship golf with no tee times. While the hazards are as challenging as ever, playing this coveted course has never been easier. Members enjoy unlimited use of the course, without paying green fees. Just pay golf cart rental fees or own a personal golf cart and this course is your personal playground. Not into golf? Work out in the fitness center then luxuriate in the pool. Play Doubles or Get into Pickleball then enjoy dinner in Windows. Live life at a new level of luxury, with a Boca Grove.

Renovate properties inside the community, without having to become a full-fledged member.

In Boca Grove, we don't allow restrictive membership structures to stagnate the redevelopment of homes inside the community. With the Boca Grove exclusive Builder/Renovator Program, highly-qualified builders can renovate properties inside the community without becoming a long-term, full-fledged member.

As part of the Builder/Renovator Program, simply pay the required fees at the time that you purchase the home. Once the property is rehabilitated and sold to a third party that becomes an equity member, you'll receive back all fees, less funds due to the Club.
